00074 #ifndef __STMNODE_H
00075 #define __STMNODE_H
00076

00081 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // Class stMNode
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 class stMNode{
00109    public:
00113       enum stMNodeType{
00117          INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
00118 
00122          LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
00123       };//end stNodeType
00124 
00128       virtual ~stMNode(){
00129       }//end ~stMNode()
00130 
00137       stNodeType GetNodeType(){
00138          return Header->Type;
00139       }//end GetNodeType
00140 
00146       stPage * GetPage(){
00147          return Page;
00148       }//end GetPage
00149 
00155       stPageID GetPageID(){
00156          return Page->GetPageID();
00157       }//end GetPage
00158 
00165       static stMNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
00166 
00175       int GetNumberOfEntries(){
00176          return this->Header->Occupation;
00177       }//end GetNumberOfEntries
00178 
00190       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
00191 
00202       virtual const stByte * GetObject(int id)=0;
00203 
00214       virtual stSize GetObjectSize(int id)=0;
00215 
00219       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius()=0;
00220 
00224       void RemoveAll(){
00225 
00226          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00227          stNodeType type;
00228          type = Header->Type;
00229          Page->Clear();
00230          Header->Type = type;
00231          #else
00232          this->Header->Occupation = 0;
00233          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00234       }//end RemoveAll
00235 
00239       static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
00240          return sizeof(stMNodeHeader);
00241       }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
00242       
00243    protected:
00247       #pragma pack(1)
00248       typedef struct stMNodeHeader{
00252          stNodeType Type;
00253 
00257          stCount Occupation;
00258       } stMNodeHeader; //end stHeader
00259       #pragma pack()
00260 
00264       stMNodeHeader * Header;
00265 
00269       stPage * Page;
00270 
00276       stMNode(stPage * page){
00277          this->Page = page;
00278          Header = (stMNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
00279       }//end stMNode
00280 };//end stMNode

00282 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00283 // Class stMIndexNode
00284 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00314 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00315 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00316 class stMIndexNode: public stMNode{
00317    public:
00321       #pragma pack(1)
00322       typedef struct stMIndexEntry{
00326          stPageID PageID;
00327 
00331          stDistance Distance;
00332 
00336          stDistance Radius;
00337 
00343          stSize Offset;
00344       } stMIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
00345       #pragma pack()
00346 
00358       stMIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00359 
00373       stMIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(int id){
00374          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00375          if ((id < 0) && (id >= GetNumberOfEntries())){
00376             throw invalid_argument("id value is out of range.");
00377          }//end if
00378          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00379 
00380          return Entries[id];
00381       }//end GetIndexEntry
00382 
00401       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00402 
00406       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00407 
00418       const stByte * GetObject(int id);
00419 
00429       stSize GetObjectSize(int id);
00430 
00439       void RemoveEntry(int id);
00440 
00444       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00445 
00449       static stSize GetIndexEntryOverhead(){
00450          return sizeof(stMIndexEntry);
00451       }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
00452 
00453    private:
00454 
00458       stMIndexEntry * Entries;
00459 
00463       stSize GetFree();
00464 
00465 };//end stMIndexPage

00496 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
00497 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00498 class stMLeafNode: public stMNode{
00499    public:
00503       #pragma pack(1)
00504       typedef struct stMLeafEntry{
00508          stDistance Distance;
00509 
00515          stSize Offset;
00516       } stMLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
00517       #pragma pack()
00518 
00530       stMLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
00531 
00545       stMLeafEntry &GetLeafEntry(int id){
00546          #ifdef __stDEBUG__
00547          if ((id < 0) && (id >= GetNumberOfEntries())){
00548             throw invalid_argument("id value is out of range.");
00549          }//end if
00550          #endif //__stDEBUG__
00551 
00552          return Entries[id];
00553       }//end GetLeafEntry
00554 
00573       virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
00574 
00578       int GetRepresentativeEntry();
00579 
00590       const stByte * GetObject(int id);
00591 
00601       stSize GetObjectSize(int id);
00602 
00613       void RemoveEntry(int id);
00614 
00618       virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
00619 
00623       static stSize GetLeafEntryOverhead(){
00624          return sizeof(stMLeafEntry);
00625       }//end GetLeafEntryOverhead()
00626       
00627    private:
00631       stMLeafEntry * Entries;
00632 
00636       stSize GetFree();
00637 };//end stMLeafNode
